<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCM extends data { const CODE = 'CM'; const PREFIX = 237; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[26]\d\d|88)\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '2(?:22|33|4[23])\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '6[5-9]\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '88\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', '(\d)(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4 $5', ); }
